Sql.CDATA: IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'vPACReturnPO' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[vPACReturnPO] GO CREATE VIEW vPACReturnPO AS SELECT [POReceiptLineAdd_POReceiptLine].[CompanyID] ,MAX([POReceiptLineAdd_POReceiptLine].[ReceiptNbr]) AS [POLine_ReceiptNbr] ,MAX([POReceiptLineAdd_POReceiptLine].[LineNbr]) AS [POLine_LineNbr] ,[POReceiptLineAdd_POReceiptLine].[InventoryID] AS InventoryID ,MAX([POReceiptLineAdd_POReceiptLine].[UOM]) AS [UOM] ,MAX([POReceipt].[ReceiptType]) AS [ReceiptType] ,MAX([POReceipt].[ReceiptNbr]) AS [ReceiptNbr] ,[POReceipt].[FinPeriodID] AS FinPeriodID ,MAX([POReceipt].[Status]) AS [Status] ,MAX([POReceipt].[NoteID]) AS [NoteID] ,MAX([POReceipt].[CuryID]) AS [CuryID] ,SUM([POReceipt].[CuryInfoID]) AS [POReceipt_CuryInfoID] ,SUM([POReceiptLineAdd_POLine].[LineAmt] * ((- 1))) AS Amt ,SUM([POReceiptLineAdd_POReceiptLine].[BaseReceiptQty] * ((- 1))) AS Qty FROM ( [POReceiptLine] [POReceiptLineAdd_POReceiptLine] LEFT JOIN [POLine] [POReceiptLineAdd_POLine] ON ([POReceiptLineAdd_POLine].[CompanyID] = [POReceiptLineAdd_POReceiptLine].[CompanyID]) AND ( [POReceiptLineAdd_POLine].[BranchID] IS NULL OR [POReceiptLineAdd_POLine].[BranchID] = 1 ) AND [POReceiptLineAdd_POLine].[OrderType] = [POReceiptLineAdd_POReceiptLine].[POType] AND [POReceiptLineAdd_POLine].[OrderNbr] = [POReceiptLineAdd_POReceiptLine].[PONbr] AND [POReceiptLineAdd_POLine].[LineNbr] = [POReceiptLineAdd_POReceiptLine].[POLineNbr] LEFT JOIN [POOrder] [POReceiptLineAdd_POOrder] ON ([POReceiptLineAdd_POOrder].[CompanyID] = [POReceiptLineAdd_POReceiptLine].[CompanyID]) AND ( [POReceiptLineAdd_POOrder].[BranchID] IS NULL OR [POReceiptLineAdd_POOrder].[BranchID] = 1 ) AND [POReceiptLineAdd_POOrder].[OrderType] = [POReceiptLineAdd_POReceiptLine].[POType] AND [POReceiptLineAdd_POOrder].[OrderNbr] = [POReceiptLineAdd_POReceiptLine].[PONbr] ) LEFT JOIN [POReceipt] [POReceipt] ON ([POReceipt].[CompanyID] = [POReceiptLineAdd_POReceiptLine].[CompanyID]) AND ( [POReceipt].[BranchID] IS NULL OR [POReceipt].[BranchID] = 1 ) AND ([POReceiptLineAdd_POReceiptLine].[ReceiptNbr] = [POReceipt].[ReceiptNbr]) WHERE ( [POReceipt].[ReceiptType] = 'RN' AND [POReceipt].[Status] = 'R' ) AND ( [POReceiptLineAdd_POReceiptLine].[BranchID] IS NULL OR [POReceiptLineAdd_POReceiptLine].[BranchID] = 1 ) GROUP BY [POReceiptLineAdd_POReceiptLine].[InventoryID] ,[POReceipt].[FinPeriodID] ,[POReceiptLineAdd_POReceiptLine].[CompanyID]
